chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!
okay
cool! i'm at the starting point right now
there's a twig leading to a small island with a tiger on my left, and it seems there are more islands and animals around. where to now, guide me?
you need to go straight towards the bird, you will see another twig that leads to the island with the bird
aha, i see the bird, i'm sending some friendly nods to the parrot now
do i head to any of the islands next or. ?
no you will go past the bird and the elephant, and then you will see a pile of rocks that will lead you to the next island and on that island you will see a frog
gotcha, i see the frog! quite a sight with these tumbling rocks
where to next?
you will need to move past the frog a bit then make a 180 degree turn and you will then see an aligator that will allow you to cross to the island with the elephant again
done and dusted, crossed the crocodile, can see the elephant again
any idea where to go now?
you will see another patch of rocks that will lead you to the next island with a girraffe
alright, i've found the giraffe next to these rocks!
next, you will see a twig that will lead you to the final island with a snake on it. once you see the snake go past it and you will see the treasure!

passed the slithering snake! there's the shiny treasure, whoop!
*finished*
what a fun journey that was!
hola, q tal? ready to start?
yes!
great! see that wooden bench left of us? let's move towards it, but don't reach it, okay? we're gonna cross a trail towards a florist stand
cool?
okay, i see the florist stand. I also see a two people on a bicycle
that's good! but oops, we're not going to the florist stand. let's do a u-turn to the left, cross the trail again and head back toward the white dog
trust me, it may seem like we're going in circles, but it'll make sense soon.
okay i did a u-turn to the left and i crossed the trail again and headed back to the white dog.
awesome! now let's head south from the dog but over the branch
you'll see another white dog sitting next to a red and white checkered picnic, that's where we're headed
okay i crossed the branch and i see the other white dog next to the checkered picnic, where to next?
cool! take a little journey over the picnic mat, touching the bowl of berries, and then keep moving west
you tracking with me?
yeah, i went passed the berries and have headed west
lovely! here's a fun bit: there's a wooden branch ahead, cross the river again, but this time head north
what do you see?
okay I have crossed the branch over the river and I see a deer and in the distance an elderly couple
that's nice
ignore the deer for a moment and avoid that green bush nearby by circling it from the right side, then head onto the florist stand
okay I avoided the green brush, and am at the florist stand
perfect! now turn left, go under the stand and onward to the big bridge with bikers
just keep going west, pass the bridge
okay I went under the stand and have made my way onto the bridge with the bikers and am not passed the bridge
fantastic! up next, you see that pair of old peeps chilling on a bench with newspapers, right? just scoot past them
okay yeah I see them, and have went passed them
sweet! now, take a few steps south, between our aged friends and another wooden branch until you reach a green bush next to the end of the branch
cool?
yeah, i have went passed the branch and am next to the bush
awesome! alright, let's head east, walk between the branch and the bush, stay on the track with me okay?
okay i walked between the branch and the brush
perfect! see a brown young deer nearby? we're about done here, that's your final destination!
Yes! i see the deer
fantastic! well done, mate! that's the end of our journey
wasn't that an adventure? thanks for the fun time!
that sure was awesome!
that's great to hear! let's do this again soon, alright? until next time!
hola, you ready?
yes
cool, i'm at the tent in the north
where to first, buddy?
you will need to head south and you will see a bush and a dog
got it
passed the bush and now standing near this cute pupper. what's the next step?
you will need to around the puppy and head towards a fire nearby, you will go around the fire and then under a big mushroom
found the fire and the big red mushie
moving forward
awesome, you will now see a car but do not head towards the car. stay following the path and you will pass a grill and then keep heading south til you see a telescope
roger that! ignored the car and the grill
now i'm at the telescope, what now?
you will need to move south inbetween the telescope and a bush then head west and up a hill to a cabin
alright, went south between the telescope and the bush
do you see the cabin?
yup, i see the cabin and some rocks around it
am i there?
almost, head to the cabin and that will be the final destination
alright, i've reached the cabin
we've *finished* the game. that was fun!
hola, q tal? ready to start?
yes
awesome! start by heading southwest under the first palm tree, then swing right past the second one
before you hit the third tree, make a sharp left and continue south. got it?
okay i have navigated to where you mentioned, where next?
cool
now just keep going left of that cute brown puppy you see, then twist a bit to the left and steer back towards the south. you're doing great!
awesome i saw the puppy and went to the left a bit and have headed south
sweet! now spot the big rock to your left and the small rock on your right
head on through there and you'll reach the water. let me know when you're there!
okay i went through the rocks and am at the water! where to next?
cool! see that big red crab in the water? turn right at the crab and stroll along the big rock
keep going west through the water. let's make a splash!
yes i see the crab! and have turned right and went west through the water!
you're doing fab! now keep an eye for a medium rock, after that, you'll see a shark
not so friendly, eh? make a sharp right!
yeah i saw the shark! scary stuff! i made a sharp right!
haha, braveyasou! now, go back to land, scoot between that medium rock and the colorful blue-yellow-white beach ball and keep heading north
let me know when you're there!
okay i went betweeen the rock and the beach ball and continued north, i now see a speaker box
excellent! from there, look slightly left and go northwest, threading the needle between the red tent on your left and that speaker on your right
can you handle that?
yeah i went inbetween the tent and the speaker box, where to next?
perfect! now, i want you to arc around the tent and then head down towards the sea
don't go in the water though!
okay I went around the tent and went towards the sea! i am next to a cayak right next to the shore
awesome! now, head right, go beneath the red kayak
okay I am beneath the kayak
superb! turn right 90 degrees now, walk along the kayak until you hit a small green bush
you've reached!
